todos.title: TRADENAME INFRINGEMENT
todos.body: Strength of the mark, Proximity of the goods, Similarity of the marks, Evidence of actual confusion, Marketing channels used, Type of goods and the degree of care likely to be exercised by the purchaser, Defendants intent in selecting the mark, Likelihood of expansion of the product lines[5]

todos.title: IS THERE A BUYER WILLING TO PAY
todos.body: Ninety percent of domain names are worthless.

todos.title: PREFIXES OR SUFFIXES
todos.body: Is it without prefixes or suffixes?

todos.title: IS IT PLURAL/SINGULAR
todos.body: Is it the common use of the phrase (example buytickets not buyticket or chat not chats)?

todos.title: TYPING EASE
todos.body: Is it easy to type?  All in same hand, short, no cross fingers, middle keyboard line.

todos.title: COMMONALITY
todos.body: How common are the words in the name?

todos.title: COMMERCIAL VALUE
todos.body: Does the word have commercial value?

todos.title: WEBSITE
todos.body: Does it have a website to it?

todos.title: UNSOLICITED OFFERS
todos.body: Do you receive unsolicited offers without it being listed?

todos.title: WORDS
todos.body: Are there few words in the name?

todos.title: Oppenheimer Rule
todos.body: People have a greater affection for words and names that are easier to pronounce.
